meanings.definition: A disorder of the spinal cord.
meanings.sent1: Her myelopathy caused weakness in her legs.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with myelopathy after the MRI.
meanings.sent3: The myelopathy made her walk like a wobbly penguin.
meanings.sent4: The myelopathy was a tangled mess of nerves in his spine.
meanings.sent5: The myelopathy felt like a heavy weight pressing down on her back.

meanings.definition: Damage or disease of the spinal cord.
meanings.sent1: The car accident resulted in severe myelopathy.
meanings.sent2: His myelopathy was caused by a rare genetic condition.
meanings.sent3: The myelopathy turned his spine into a grumpy snake.
meanings.sent4: The myelopathy was a silent intruder in her nervous system.
meanings.sent5: The myelopathy whispered pain along his spinal cord.
